job_description:
Job Description:
1. Design, develop and test the digital system to optimize manufacturing flow and capacity.
2. API Development and Integration across company system.
3. Create detailed technical documentation to support the future improvement/debug.

Requirements:
1. Frontend skills: React.js (include Next.js), Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, Recharts & Chart.js, Axios, Three.js (3D Model Library)
2. Backend skills: REST API, JSON Web Token, PostgreSQL, FastAPI, Web Scraping (BeautifulSoup Phyton), Data Manipulation (NumPy, Pandas), OpenPyXL, Network & Security, CRUD.
3. Programming languages: Phyton, JavaScript/Typescript, SQL, Go
4. Tools & Technologies: Git/GitHub (Version Control), Postman, TamperMonkey (Browser Script), Wireshark (Network Analysis)
